General.Name: Mako Mining Corp
General.Description: Mako Mining Corp. operates as a gold mining and exploration company in Nicaragua. Its primary asset is the San Albino property located in Nueva Segovia, Nicaragua. The company was formerly known as Golden Reign Resources Ltd. and changed its name to Mako Mining Corp. in November 2018. Mako Mining Corp. was incorporated in 2004 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 838 West Hastings Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 0A6
